nodes.text: Operation Sieve was the second of four small operations led by Darth Vader against the Rebel Alliance in 1.5 ABY. Its purpose was to weaken their recruiting efforts in the cities of Bestine, Coronet and Theed. Vader recruited a skillful Imperial agent who subsequently hunted down and killed twenty-five rebel guardsmen.
This is the second of four missions in Star Wars Galaxies that players of the Imperial faction receive from Lord Vader during one of his sporadic appearances in Bestine, Coronet or Theed.
The player has to kill 25 rebel NPCs named "a watchful Rebel guard" and receives 25,000 credits and 500 imperial faction points as reward.
